scripts.build: npm run clean && bundle exec jekyll build
scripts.build-local: npm run clean && bundle exec jekyll build --config _config.yml,_config.local.yml
scripts.test: npm run build-local && bundle exec htmlproofer ./_site --assume-extension --url-ignore '/tags/,/api/,/localhost/' --file-ignore /api/ --check-html --allow-hash-href --check-opengraph
